channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [CXF-4614] Error using role, tokenService and ValidationService when initialize client AccessTokenValidation.
item.description:
Hi,
We use AccessTokenService with validation. We use a validation service. If we add roles in UserSubject, when we create the object AccessTokenValidation.class whith AccessTokenValidatorClient, we have an exception when create the roles list.
We think it's because the POJO UserSubject is initialize with private List<String> roles = Collections.emptyList();

What do you think about this ?

Think
Guillaume
item.summary: Error using role, tokenService and ValidationService when initialize client AccessTokenValidation.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Hi, can you please provide more info about the exception, thanks
OK, I've replaced "Collections.emptyList()" with "new LinkedList()" in UserSubject initialization code. Give it a try please when a new snapshot is available, thanks

I try with an ArrayList and LinkedList in the client validation side, it works.
Thanks for fixing.

Do you know schedule for 2.7.1 ?

Guillaume

Jaxb vesion 2.2.5

This the stack trace before fixing :

Thanks for the confirmation, I'm resolving this JIRA then given that this is what I did, added LinkedList instead.
2.7.1 is probably few weeks away...
